DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare one-time application Paclitaxel SeQuent Please ( Paclitaxel-coated Balloon Catheter ) use Coroflex Blue ( Cobalt Chromium Stent ) slow release small dose Paclitaxel Coroflex Please ( Paclitaxel-Eluting Stent ) stent system non-inferiority trial .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) With Bare Metal Stent ( BMS ) Followed Paclitaxel-Coated Balloon Catheter Versus Paclitaxel-Eluting Stent
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic coronary artery disease include patient chronic stable angina , unstable angina silent ischemia Presence one coronary artery stenosis > 50 % native coronary artery 2.25 3.5 mm diameter cover one stent One lesion treat study device Pregnancy Known intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel , heparin , stainless steel , paclitaxel , cobalt , chromium contrast material Inability provide inform consent Currently participate another trial reach primary endpoint Elective surgery within 12 month percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) unless dual antiplatelet therapy maintain throughout perisurgical period Acute recent myocardial infarction leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 30 % Stroke transient ischemic attack within 6 month Stented segment longer 23 mm Vessel diameter le 2,5 mm Significant calcification , chronic total occlusion ( CTO ) thrombus target lesion
